BOOMBLE: What, like this? Allow me to offer
you a guinea.
v G>\
WITCH: (TAKING GUINEA) Thank you. Yes, like
that.
BOOMBLE: To everyone I meet?
WITCH: Yes, to everyone you meet.
BOOMBLE: Allow me to offer you a guinea.
WITCH: (TAKING) With pleasure, Mister
Boomblehardt.
BOOMBLE: But people who don’t know me will
think I’m making them a present!
